title: Inquire About Policy Riders
description: A policyholder wants to know what optional riders they have on their life insurance policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and retrieve their policy details.
Review the policy contract to identify any active riders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy has an Accidental Death Benefit rider and a Waiver of Premium rider.

tasks.description: Explain each rider and what it covers to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the function of both riders in simple terms.
